post_text: Big congrats 👏 to BCHS sophomore Megan Dellenbaugh, who wrote her award-winning play "Almost a Fairytale" -- recently selected by Cap Rep as one of the region's best -- while juggling schoolwork. And what did this aspiring playwright have to say about writing for the stage? "It took a few days to write, but a long time to edit and revise." We think lots of famous writers out there would agree. Congratulations, Megan! #MakingBCproud #WeAreBC 🎭
